text: Edrick Eduardo Menjívar Jonhnson (born 1 March 1993) is a Honduran footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Olimpia in the Liga Nacional de Fútbol Profesional de Honduras. On 21 November 2018 Menjivar made his senior debut for the Honduras national team against Chile.https://us.soccerway.com/matches/2018/11/21/world/friendlies/chile/honduras/2922867/ ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Honduran footballers Category:C.D. title: Edrick Menjívar
